messages.content:
You are tasked with adding English translations to a set of stakeholder quotes. For each quote:
- If the quote is in English, add "N.A." as the translation
- If the quote is in any other language, provide an accurate English translation

Input format is a markdown table with stakeholder names and quotes.
Output should be a markdown table with three columns: name, original quote, and translation.

IMPORTANT RULES:
- Never translate English quotes to English - use "N.A." instead.
- Only and always translate non-English quotes.
- If the original quote, in the third column of the md table is not in english, translate it and add the translation in the 4th column, as described below, but that is only when the quote is not in English.
- Keep original quotes exactly as they are.
- Maintain the markdown table format, without including any horizontal divider lines

Example input:
| Pierre Dupont | Consumer | "Cette décision est importante." |
| John Smith | Fortescue's corporate lawyer | "We need to review this carefully." |

Example output:
| Pierre Dupont | Consumer | "Cette décision est importante." | "This decision is important." |
| John Smith | Fortescue's corporate lawyer | "We need to review this carefully." | N.A. |

Example input:
| [Person Name 1] | Person Role 1 | [Original Quote in another language (e.g. Dutch, French, German, Spanish,eyc..)] |
| [person Name 2] | Person Role 2 | [Original Quote in English] |

Example output:
| [person Name 1] | Person Role 1 | [Original Quote in another language (e.g. Dutch, French, German, Spanish,etc..)] | [Translated Quote] |
| [person Name 2] | Person Role 2 | [Original Quote in English] | N.A. |

If the input is "None", return "None". if the original quote is not in English, make sure it is translated. Add "N.A" if the quote is already in English.

Input quotes:
| Andrew Forrest | Founder of Fortescue | "Upon discovering the surveillance, Fortescue founder Andrew Forrest expressed his surprise and warned the FMG legal team." |
| Michael Masterman | Former CFO of Fortescue | "Williams said around three terabytes of data were seized, containing confidential and privileged information that was unrelated to the case." |
| Bart Kolodziejczyk | Former Scientist at Fortescue | "Williams said around three terabytes of data were seized, containing confidential and privileged information that was unrelated to the case." |
| Bjorn Winther-Jensen | Former Scientist at Fortescue | "Williams said around three terabytes of data were seized, containing confidential and privileged information that was unrelated to the case." |
| Wayne McFaull | Mining and engineering consultant | "Projects in the nature and complexity of the Fortescue project and the Element Zero project take a great deal of trial and error." |

| Andrew Forrest | Founder of Fortescue | "Upon discovering the surveillance, Fortescue founder Andrew Forrest expressed his surprise and warned the FMG legal team." | N.A. |
| Michael Masterman | Former CFO of Fortescue | "Williams said around three terabytes of data were seized, containing confidential and privileged information that was unrelated to the case." | N.A. |
| Bart Kolodziejczyk | Former Scientist at Fortescue | "Williams said around three terabytes of data were seized, containing confidential and privileged information that was unrelated to the case." | N.A. |
| Bjorn Winther-Jensen | Former Scientist at Fortescue | "Williams said around three terabytes of data were seized, containing confidential and privileged information that was unrelated to the case." | N.A. |
| Wayne McFaull | Mining and engineering consultant | "Projects in the nature and complexity of the Fortescue project and the Element Zero project take a great deal of trial and error." | N.A. |
